data.title: God Hath Sent His Son This Day
A Sinless, Pure, and Holy Man
Built on the Rock of Christ
Again the Day of Holy Rest
Again the Voice of Christ is Heard
As Families in the Latter Days
I’ve Set My Path to Serve Thee
Rise Up, Oh Daughters of Zion
We Worship Now Before Thee, Lord
When Godly Sorrow Moves the Soul
With the Faith of Alma and Nephi
Be Strong and of Good Courage
May Thy Face of Shining Splendor
We Come Before Thee on This Day
What Sacred, Holy Hour Is This?
An Angel with the Trump of God
Before Thee, Lord, I Bow My Head
Behold, the Mountain of the Lord
Christ Came unto His Other Sheep
